newsitem.title: USA: Adobe sets first venture stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: Adobe sets first venture stock dividend.

text.p: Adobe Systems Inc Thursday announced its first dividend of venture investment stock under its venture dividend program.
Adobe said it will give shareholders of record on July 31 one share of Netscape Communications Corp on August 27 for every one hundred shares of Adobe held.
Shareholders of record holding less than 2,500 shares of Adobe will be paid in cash.

Adobe invested in Netscape in April 1995. About half of it's holdings in Netscape were sold in a registered secondary offering by Netscape in the fourth quarter of 1996 for net proceeds to Adobe of about $46 million.
Adobe's venture dividend program is intended to share with Adobe shareholders the financial benefits of the success of its venture investing program whihc has investments in 23 companies.
From time to time, Adobe expects it will be able to announce other venture stock dividends.
